wikipedia_page.main: Walter Hartley  (born 1879) was an organist and composer based in England.

response: *Walter Hartley's web site contains a complete chronological list of his works. (This website now defunct, but survives in screen captures by the library of congress.)https://webarchive.loc.gov/all/20181107221732/http://www.walterhartley.com/
*Walter Hartley page at Tritone Press & Tenuto Publications site.
*Walter Hartley You Tube site contains videos of Walter Hartley playing his compositions on piano.
